issue.message: The getter return type (`int[]`) and setter parameter type (`int...`) getter and setter methods for property `colorSchemeColors` should have exactly the same type to allow be accessed as a property from Kotlin; see https://android.github.io/kotlin-guides/interop.html#property-prefixes
